blogPost.excerpt: Autonomously generate tests based on how your users are using your app in production. The easiest way to build automated tests for your website or mobile app. And, record the tests using browser plugin and maintain them as plain English tests.
blogPost.body: Autonomously generate tests based on how your users are using your app in production. The easiest way to build automated tests for your website or mobile app. And, record the tests using browser plugin and maintain them as plain English tests.
blogPost.title: testRigor - Write your tests in plain English. No coding skills required
blogPost.author: Artem Golubev

localize.description: 根据您的用户在生产中使用您的应用程序的情况，自主生成测试。为您的网站或移动应用构建自动化测试的最简单方法。而且，使用浏览器插件记录测试，并将其作为纯英文测试进行维护。
localize.tagline: 用简单的英语编写你的测试。无需编码技能

localize.description: 根據您的用戶在生產中使用您的應用程序的情況，自主生成測試。爲您的網站或移動應用構建自動化測試的最簡單方法。而且，使用瀏覽器插件記錄測試，並將其作爲純英文測試進行維護。
localize.tagline: 用簡單的英語編寫你的測試。無需編碼技能
